ModMetaData.name: [A17] Feeding Job Mod
ModMetaData.author: Bryan Bettis
ModMetaData.description: This mod creates a separate job called "Feed," which takes care of feeding prisoners (instead of having a warden do it,) and is also a way to allow non-doctor pawns to feed injured/infected pawns and pets in bed. Feeding prisoners is set as a higher priority than feeding colonists, since doctors can still feed patients as needed.
